quests.name: Conquer the Shadowed Peaks
quests.description: Embark on an epic journey to 'Conquer the Shadowed Peaks.' Face ferocious 'Shadow Beasts' and 'Twilight Drakes' as you ascend the treacherous mountains. Uncover the lost history of this shadowy realm.

quests.name: Unlock the Secrets of Twilight
quests.description: Seek out the 'Twilight Altar' hidden deep within the peaks and 'Unlock the Secrets of Twilight.' Solve intricate puzzles and gather 'Luminous Crystals' to harness the unique power of twilight magic.

quests.name: Bane of the Shadow Beasts
quests.description: Protect the local settlements from the relentless 'Shadow Beasts.' Track down their lairs and eliminate the threat to ensure the safety of the mountain villages.

quests.name: Sorcery of the Eclipse
quests.description: Unravel the 'Sorcery of the Eclipse' that shrouds the peaks during lunar events. Collect 'Eclipsed Runestones' and confront 'Eclipse Shamans' to harness this mysterious power.

quests.name: Guardian of the Abyss
quests.description: Discover the ancient guardian known as the 'Twilight Serpent.' Defeat this formidable 'Shadow Guardian' to reveal the hidden truths of the peaks and restore balance.
